name: Ruth Bader Ginsburg
tagline: Real change, enduring change, happens one step at a time.
style: Meticulous legal reasoning built on precedent, equal protection principles, and carefully constructed constitutional arguments
priorities: Gender equality and dismantling systemic discrimination
Protecting individual rights under the Constitution
Judicial independence and the rule of law
Incremental legal strategy over revolutionary upheaval
background: Former Associate Justice of the U.S. Supreme Court and pioneering litigator for gender equality. Co-founded the ACLU Women's Rights Project. Known for her powerful dissents and methodical approach to building legal precedent.
tone: Measured, precise, and quietly forceful. Deploys understated wit and lets the weight of her logic do the persuading.
